workshoptitle: Migrate PeopleSoft to Autonomous Database Serverless using Zero Downtime Migration

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create a new Oracle Autonomous Database
Lab 2: Create a Service Request for PeopleSoft on ADB-S
Lab 3: Source Database, ADB connectivity test and Target ADB-S Configuration
Lab 5: ZDM user configuration and network connectivity between source & target systems
Lab 6: Configure OCI ADB-S Database for PeopleSoft
Lab 7: Prepare the ZDM Response File and execute Evaluation Job
Lab 8: Perform Database Migration for PeopleSoft
Lab 9: PeopleSoft post import scripts for ADB-S
Lab 10: Validate PeopleSoft Schema Objects on ADB-S
Lab 11: PeopleSoft Middle Tier Setup & Configuration and Test PeopleSoft login in OCI
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
